basics.name: Albert Fernández
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary:
I am software engineer passionate about frontend web and mobile development. I have experience building web applications with ES6, React and Webpack. I am a very fast learner, and always eager to learn new things.
I am a very curious person, which enjoys hacking and playing with new technologies, not afraid of breaking stuff.

work.summary: At Zendesk, I work at the Knowledge Bank app, which is part of the multi-branded Help Center product. The app is build using cutting edge web technologies.
highlights: Built a library of accessible and themeable React components, which is shared and used by the rest of the organization.
Built on top of the legacy text editor for writing articles, while using modern technologies and keeping backwards compatibility. Ensured it by using snapshot regression tests.
Changed the architecture to use a different state management (Redux) which improved developer productivity and reduced code complexity and bugs.
Improved the performance of the application by introducing best practises in building immutable user interfaces.

work.summary: Podio is a workflow collaboration SaaS platform for organizations
highlights: Building reusable and maintainable web components using React for the Podio web app. Test Driven Development with mocha and jsdom
Responsible for tech projects to keep the web app up-to-date with modern technologies, as React v0.14 or Webpack/SystemJS

Responsible for building a brand new Podio’s public facing website and for its maintenance. The website is a custom-made app built in Ruby on Rails with a component-based fully responsive mobile first approach.

work.summary: Programmer in WallViz research project. The objective of the WallViz research project is to use visualization on wall-sized, interactive displays for improving decision making from massive collections of data.
highlights: Responsible for development of dynamic D3.js visualizations using touchable displays.
Responsible for the full stack (frontend, backend and operations)

work.summary: Developer in a project for proving grounds management integrated with customer portal, using J2EE, Hibernate and Spring.
highlights: Developed the web interface of a booking system, where customers could book race tracks

work.summary: Build Management for BMW embedded software projects.
highlights: Development and maintenance of automatic release tools using Ruby Rake, Atlassian Bamboo and custom Java applications
Management of SVN repository status, continuous build and unit tests
